review: What a let down, this device functions so slow. I bought this mainly for using PLEX, this thing forces you to make an account to use your local plex server and keeps promoting you to pay for plex. I started playing a video and it pauses a ton. It also will not stream movies from prime without issues saying slow internet connection. I tested my Roku doing the same things and there were no issues. After that I decided to return it. It had only been plugged into my tv for 45 minutes, this thing was so hot I could barley hold it. Maybe that is why it is called the fire stick because it can probably start a fire in your home. I will be buying a second Roku.

review: I've used this with Amazon Video and Netflix. The wireless remote and iPhone apps are great. Setup was easy, it responds quickly and feels responsive. This is a vast improvement over Roku's terrible TV stick. That thing was painfully slow, awkward and requires a credit card for basic setup. Google's Chromecast stick plays video better than this, but it doesn't have a dedicated remote or Amazon Video.When playing Netflix, the video sometimes freezes and jerks a few seconds every 10 to 15 minutes. It looks like Fire TV is causing the problem. My WiFi and cable modem work perfectly and Fire TV is less than 10 feet from the access point. On the same TV, Google's Chromecast plays Netflix perfectly.
